subject: Java 1.4 and JUnit. Contradiction?
msgSnippet: Surprisingly fail of JUnit crashes my WindowsXP copmuter to blue- screen. Whenever I get an error in JUnit UI-window next click to close the window leads the
messageBody:
Surprisingly fail of JUnit crashes my WindowsXP copmuter to blue-
screen. Whenever I get an error in JUnit UI-window next click to
close the window leads the computer to crash.
Ideas?
